mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT, GROUP_NO, DEPTH, WRITE_AT, USER_NO, IDOL_NO FROM (SELECT R.CONTENT, R.DEPTH, R.GROUP_NO, R.WRITE_AT, R.IDOL_NO, U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL, U.PW FROM USERS U INNER JOIN REPLY R ON U.USER_NO = R.USER_NO WHERE R.IDOL_NO = #{idolNo})A ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, WRITE_AT DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
